The shirt was pretty thin in material. It has a decent look but the large was quite billowy and not very fitting at all. I am a medium to thin build and would wear a medium diameter shirt. I chose a large because I was planning on rolling up the sleeves and wearing this over other shirts. It's a unique look to the shirt for sure. I'm usually skeptical of buying clothing off of Amazon because the quality is not always the best. That's not the case with this shirt. The quality is great, the shirt is a little heavier than I expected but I like it and have no complaints. I'll likely purchase more from this brand in the future.

The description I read stated this was corduroy. This is not the texture or look of corduroy, it is more of a waffle weave shirt. It is also pretty thin without much weight/structure to it, with that said, for the price, it is an ok shirt. My son layers this over a tshirt.

Overall not really impressed with this shirt. The material is thin, it looks wrinkly and cheap, and it's just not something that I'm ever going to wear. The fact that they call this a shacket, or a jacket, is comical... It's just a shirt, at best... And not really even a great shirt.  The review criteria asked for a review of its comfort and whether it's lightweight... So I will say that it is lightweight, and it's relatively comfortable... It just doesn't look very good. Also, it fits a little small, so if you decide that you do want to I'd suggest sizing up if you're on the bubble between sizes.  I've now tried several different "coolfandy" products, and I've been disappointed with each of them... This will be my last order from this company. Your mileage may vary, overall it's not a terrible shirt.. It's just not for me, and it's most certainly not a jacket.

评论概述: Very Lightweight But A Real Favorite
评论详情: I got this shirt for my son and he loves it. It is extremely lightweight- too much for me- but he likes it as he wears it more like a jacket. It is soft and comfortable. He wears it often right now while the weather is mild but I'm sure he'll need more of a layer underneath once it really cools off. It runs true to size, and it washed well on cold and then hung to dry. It was a little wrinkly, so I ran an iron over it, but also got a frown from him so maybe the ironing wasn't really necessary. Bottom line: he's happy with it and likes it.
Shirt was inexpensive. Can wear in informal situations. Good deal for the cost. Does not look like it cost a lot, though.

评论概述: Cool looking shirt and perfect for fall
评论详情: I really like the style and the fabric of this shirt. Since the material is a little thick, this shirt is perfect for cool fall days. The size was as expected and I washed in cold water and it came out from dryer wrinkle free.

First of all, this is a quite thick shirt, it is perfect for cooler days as a shirt or to be worn over a tshirt like a jacket  Second, it comes out of the dryer just as if it has been ironed. So impressive.  Workmanship os very high quality. I loved the cut. I can’t say it is slim fit but it is not a loose cut at all. Color is beautiful. Definitely it is a great shirt.  Highly recommended.

Looking forward to fall when i can wear this shirt over a t-shirt. Well made, fits as it should and looks like it could take washing machine punishment. Soft fabric with good stitching, very happy with this purchase.
I ordered a 3x. I normally wear a 2x. The shirt was tight and short. Definitely order at least 2 sizes up.

The shirt is light and stylish, with great comfort and construction.  The fit is accurate, and the shirt doesn't feel loose or baggy.  Additionally, its grid texture gives the shirt a pleasant accent and a comfortable feel.  Overall, it's a great shirt and a great addition to my wardrobe, as COOFANDY never fails to deliver in fabric quality, style, comfort, and design.
Fiancé is 6’1 about 230ish he’s a big guy and the XL fit great

评论概述: Perfect to take along with you
评论详情: A shirt jacket is perfect for me. I'm a small person and I get cold easily, especially at night. This is the ideal piece of clothing to take with me when I leave the house. Often times I go to a bar or restaurant and they have the A/C so cranked up I literally shiver. Or you might be out on a nice day in a short-sleeve shirt, but as soon as the sun goes down you get a chill. I keep this shirt jacket close at hand for just suck occasions.  The material is nice and soft. I opted to go with grey because it's so neutral it matches nearly everything. The cut is nice, if not slightly dull (which is odd for the COOFANDY brand), but I suppose even COOFANDY needs to make some highly accessible pieces to counter their more exciting fashions.  It really is more of a shirt than a jacket, and I would say it's corduroy; it's more of a waffle weave. As with all jackets, I wish there was an inside pocket, but there is not, just one breast pocket. Still, this shacket looks much nicer than a hoodie. It's a highly functional addition to a spring or fall wardrobe. If you buy one, I predict you'll get quite a bit of use out of it.
Great fit love it, just right for cool weather

评论概述: A very nice, light weight shirt
评论详情: It was as expected.  Seems to be of decent quality.  I will see how it holds up in the wash.

评论概述: Comfortable.  Use Caution with Sizing Chart.  Good Look for Fall.
评论详情: The men’s waffle material button long sleeve shirt / jacket w/pocket (ASIN: B0C9ZDCC1P) is a comfortable shirt.  I Really like the color.  This will be a good fall look.The title in the product description is a little misleading.  The title states that it is “Button Down”.  Button down normally refers to the collar in men’s shirts.  This is not a button down collar.  The shirt does have buttons, in the front, for closure.  The title also list “Pockets”.  There is only one pocket, on the chest, left side.I am 6’3”, 200 lbs.  There are two options provided for choosing the shirt size, the Amazon method and the seller’s chart.  Amazon showed I should get a large, which is pretty normal for me (L or XL).  The seller’s sizing chart indicated I needed a medium, mainly based on the posted chest size.  Most shirts are too short in sleeve length for me, but I really do not like a fat, baggy waist, so I went with the seller’s chart and ordered a medium.  Should have gotten the large.  The shirt does okay unbuttoned and worn out, more like a jacket, but it really too snug buttoned like a shirt.

I like the softness of the material on the shirt. This is a good shirt for fall or winter, it's a little heavy for summertime however. It's very comfortable. The only downside that I see is that it is tight in the shoulders so you might want to order one size larger in my opinion. I am 6 foot two, 255 pounds and I got the XXL and it's tight in the shoulders. Also the buttons are slightly large for the holes so you do have to work to get the buttons through the holes. despite these concerns I do like the shirt and will definitely wear it.
I recently ordered the 2x brown shacket. My husband typically wears a 2x and this fit perfectly. The material is soft and lightweight, perfect for southern winters.

This is a nicer "Shacket" then I had imagined. It fits true to size and the fabric is nice and thick. This makes a great heavy shirt or jacket. The stitching is well made and there were no loose threads. It has held up to a wash with no issues what so ever and unlike some others did it with out much in the wrinkle department. Very happy.
Nice product for casual coverup.

Most importantly... it fits.  And it fits well.  It might be a little tight in the shoulders, but I work out.  And a good shirt to show those results.  That sounded awkward.  Let me say that this shirt fits a male shape well.Regardless of build.  I am about 20 pounds overweight at the moment and the shirt really hides that belly well.  Ten years ago, I wouldn't consider purchasing clothing online.  Now I am much less apprehensive about buying online.  The webpage has lots of pictures of this shirt.  And pictures with it being worn.  Almost as good as a dressing room mirror.  Nothing will replace the actual 'feel' of the garment in person, but knowing fabrics helps a lot.  I like the 'waffle' type texture - similar to corduroy.  The care tag states 100% polyester, but it feels soft like cotton.  It has a thickness to it as well.  The care tag also warns against machine drying.  I will probably hang this to dry.  It looks like it might need to be ironed as well.  Although not tailored or slim fit, this shirt gathers nicely at the bottom.  Not a huge flare like shirts that are meant to be tucked in.  Definitely a shirt that is intended for cool weather.  To sum this up, good shirt, good price, good fit and good quality.  5 stars from me.

Very Nice Material and Fit.  This shirt has a very nice, muted color that allows you to blend into the environment.  The Fit is exact, and very comfortable to wear inside or outside your pants.  It has just a Hint at Tails.  This is all shown in pictures #1 & #2.  Picture #3 shows the Cuff's have two Buttons for a snug fit around the Wrist.  Picture #2 also allows you to see the Corduroy Welts.  All in All a Very nice Shirt!
This shirt is a bit thick for a summer shirt. It will be nice on cool fall evenings though.

I love Coofandy clothes. The best fit and quality clothing on amazon. Period. By now I have probably 6 plus shirts from them and I love each one of them. This one is no exception. It came in packed in an airtight sealed package (hence the wrinkles in the picture attached) and as soon as I received the package, I tried it on and fell in love with the quality and the way it looked on me. More like a tailored fit. The shirt overall is well put together and the cloth is light enough even though it is knitted, it is still light weight and can be worn casually. Sizing matches the description. Definitely recommend this to anyone. Won't regret.

The XL shirt fits me almost perfectly.  Shirt is comfortable and has a nice smooth, soft feel.  The material is first rate and appears durable---it reminds me of light corduroy material.  Garment is sewn/stitched with quality tailoring.  It provides a bit of warmth but is not as heavy as flannel shirts.  I have ordered several items made by "Coofandy" and all items are stylish, well made and comfortable.  This is an excellently made shirt at a reasonable price.
Nicely constructed, but it needs to be ironed after it is washed.  Comfortable to wear and fits well.  Nice shirt.

I have become a fan of the Coo,fandy brand. My wife compliments everything I get from them. I find most of their products to be better quality a brand with nice selections, colors and designs. This blue is a very nice color and the waffle fabric is not something I have seen before. It somewhat resembles a herringbone. The fit is true to size , fabric is nice and the look unique.. My wife loves it as well.
Beau tissus
Fits true to size, great casual shirt!

The sizes are not US (North America). Quite small actually. This is also not a shacket as stated in their product title current for when I write this review. It is just a shirt. Looks nice but does not meet size or shacket expectations.
La coupe, la couleur et le tissus , tout de cette chemise me plait. C’est une chemise confortable et agréable à porter dans toutes les occasions.Merci elle vaut son prix.
